topic.title: Zeronet Freenet and I2P
topic.body: Looking for some insights on whether I should use Zeronet or Freenet, and what about all the old freenet flogs and sites? How do we preserve them for the future?

1581891315_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsK.body:
The site is archived with a few screens here 
http://archive.is/tAy74 

but yea it's sad to see his site having been downed so fast.

Had anyone elses' nudes been leaked that it wouldn't have been that swift and such a big deal.

Just for the sake of the fact that noone should have more right to "privacy" than others I really ask anyone who has said nudes to please share them to us.

As to free speech, attemps like 4chan and 8ch have shown us that:
A: Free speech doesn't exist here anymore because we are too lazy to implement and protect it
B: When it kind of exists it's just for stupid crap that's divisive and doesn't produce anything useful (see curent state of /pnd/ which is a loss of time for anyone on it)

1581518987_12V9AjYgcFFTD5rF89JUNqYcQTm2k.body:
Considering how women were treated before and after islam, it sure is a feminist attempt.

Before Islam: getting buried alive because no food and rapist may come

After Islam: fair amount of rights in terms of not being repudiated in their wedding, rights to inherit their husband stuff, protection against injustice as human beings

After westernized islam: can't drive a car anymore so will be less prone to sedentarity disease but still: not forced to work for the capitalists and can do their natural work of bearing children

Ow, thanks for the insight. Never used I2P actually but thought it had a similar purpose than those two

> [z0net](#comment_5_1KpsEG8BKkSJPFv8VVbngfC7xToMrYDJfS): http://127.0.0.1:8888/USK@jj6NdcmPiqI4TnRckgXHJTkGHAgFZVNeMTGa13E9ZPk,JkuHG5IKOYlXFidCLBj8d2cv8ENFhgkBTIfZ3AjQl~U,AQACAAE/SpaceMushies/3/

> [aeldg7pg4b](#comment_29_1NdJyMSqnWWim7ibxBvaNsMgQvqkkTXVnz): Freenet seems to be dying, but Zeronet still has a pulse. [...]

Pardon me for the perharps stupid question, who'd Kocis? A Zeronet dev?

> [aeldg7pg4b](#comment_29_1NdJyMSqnWWim7ibxBvaNsMgQvqkkTXVnz): Freenet seems to be dying, but Zeronet still has a pulse. [...]

1582649582_13EafRdDw5sZF42dTn68uDdcssTWK.body:
my two cents on this issue: it's a non issue, we have more important stuff to deal with than women being shamed or the opportunity to undress everyone. Especially when violence as mentioned by nitrowing or lust corrupt the mind and stray it away for said priorities (reducing human suffering, building a more optimized society, fighting pollution or climate change or whatever)

Also shame exists because it helps bind society together, for people are afraid of being cast outside their group, if we make shame disappear, adverse consequences may occur.

1583479244_18YbbFYMzM2PLZwPLddxGqRsjbBFH.body:
FBI on its way for wire fraud scam.

I don't think it's a good thing that zer0net gets tainted with such people like you anyway.

Joke aside, those cards are really useful on:
-airplanes without internet connection (eg: their wifi movie store)
- used to work on amazon but not really anymore as they now bill the cc before giving access to the media
- will pass any offline check as they are algometrically valid

1587670973_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3Sdu.body:
In the philosophical sense it's left wing as it puts everyone on the same fair place, cheating with influence, money, ... is harder here. (right wing in this sense would be about authoritarianism, which is hardly applicable here)

But yea like edgelordofdecent said it's a bullshit dichotomy, both people on the right and the left think they're promoting and acting "the right way" and feel justified to act on the other "side" not as they would people would act unto them.
